data.title: Better than any hotel in Lakeland
data.text: Very convenient downtown location just a few blocks from downtown Lakeland restaurants, businesses, and night spots but in a quiet neighborhood -- overlooks the beautiful Hollis Gardenss and close to the Lake Mirror historic promenade. Spacious rooms, tastefully and elegantly appointed. The hosts are amenable and helpful but unobtrusive. Owner was a former Lakeland city councilman, and he is a treasure trove of information about the city.
